snippet.title: Mafia C64 Longplay [127] Full Playthrough / Walkthrough (no commentary) #c64 #retrogaming
snippet.description:
Longplay / complete playthrough of the 1986 C64 classic Mafia by Igelsoft, version 1.31 by TheRyk.  Published 20 November 2016.

Mafia is a turn-based game for up to 4 players set in 1920s Chicago in which players assume the role of a gangster making their way to the top of the local underground.

Mafia release dates:
- C64: 1986

Mafia Longplay No. 29 of the Ludophiles longplays project:
- https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFXG3BI19O5rpA9sB1_-K_x5s207hoahb
- http://www.ludophiles.com/threads/ludophiles-longplays-project.180/

Mafia is Longplay No. 127 of RecordedC64Games.org:
- https://recordedc64games.org/raid-over-moscow/

Five more selected C64 longplays:
- Raid Over Moscow: https://youtu.be/SaTe_7uoGDw
- Project Firestart: https://youtu.be/sUb-oWAkuX0
- Skool Daze: https://youtu.be/J1AMlyicaCI
- The Last Ninja: https://youtu.be/TPPlJhpE_9Y
- Space Taxi  https://youtu.be/hmfLOvE_8AI

ludophiles #ludophilia #gaming #longplay #playthrough #retro #c64 #mafia #MafiaGame
